ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] [OT] Nvidia Drivers
ygData.msgSnippet: Did they actually RELEASE these or is the 6.18 driver off a leak site? I m not exactly on top of their latest drivers since I *rarely* upgrade drivers unless
ygData.messageBody:
Did they actually RELEASE these or is the 6.18 driver off a "leak" site?

I'm not exactly on top of their latest drivers since I *rarely* upgrade
drivers unless I'm having a problem of some kind or I see several people
stating that the new ones are worth the upgrade.

"If it ain't broke, don't fix it"

----- Original Message -----
From: "Daniel Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>
To: "EQ Bards" <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 16, 2000 11:55 AM
Subject: [eqbards] [OT] Nvidia Drivers


> Sorry for the OT to everyone who DOESN'T use an Nvidia card - but there
was
> a discussion here earlier - so I wanted to give a heads-up to those who
do.
>
> Nvidia recently released their Detonator 3 Driver (version 6.18 - man
their
> numbering scheme leads to confusion). Until this update I never had a
> driver-related problem in EQ - (even with SB-Live that a lot of people
have
> had problems with).
>
> Once I installed 6.18 and went into EQ - it locked up. The first time - I
> tried switching from weaps to Drum - and it locked when I put the drum in
> the appropriate hand slot. Rebooted, came back to EQ. Then did a tell or
> two - and as soon as I tried to move forward - locked again.
>
> I had to revert to previous drivers (5.33) and no problems. Beware
> upgrading drivers...
>
>
> Slyde Katzenjammer
>
>
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
>
